blade-art.label: Blade Art
blade-art.description:
Blade Arts are special abilities unique to Mystic Knights. A Blade Art can only be performed once before needing to be Recharge.

You can Recharge all of your Blade Arts by spending 10 minutes doing the Refocus Activity.

soul.label: Soul
soul.description: An action, feat or spell with the Soul trait requires at least one Soul Shard to be casted or performed.

egi.label: Egi
egi.description: Spells with the Egi trait can only be casted by a Jeweled Egi. The spell still utilizes the master's Spell Attack and Spell DC and uses one of their Focus Points.
